AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexican border: geographical boundary relevant to the case and location of the incident, reference point for distance
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: city through which Interstate 35 passes and located near the border, one of the towns before reaching Moore
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Interstate 35: highway leading directly to the border and passing through several towns including Laredo, Texas and Moore, common smuggling route with history of alien smuggling
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Moore: location near the border and one of the towns passed by Interstate 35, located after Laredo on the way to the border
